revised_title: Effects of Substituents on C-Br Bond Dissociation Energies in Substituted Bromobenzenes
tldr: The authors studied the impact of various substituents on the C-Br bond dissociation energy in substituted bromobenzenes. They found that the bond dissociation energy changes depending on the nature and position of the substituent in the benzene ring. This research helps to understand the reactivity of aromatic compounds and the effect of substituents on chemical reactions.
